page.title: 11N.CAVE SCHOOL FAMILY EVENING
page.content: Every year at school we have a family evening. Usually our school leavers compete against parents in games of football, netball and a silly water race. This year we are basing it on the wild west. The children in the fourth year will be braves and squaws and the adults will be cowboys. We're going to have a bonfire which my dad will be in charge of and we will sing wild west songs. Normally we have a barbecue and roast ribs, sausages and beefburgers. There will also be folk dancing and side shows. The idea of the evening is for families to enjoy themselves. Although we sometimes have fund raising events in school this isn't meant to be one of them.. However nearly Â£200 profit was made and everyone had lots of fun.
